lines.text: Hey Pippin.

Welcome to the tech demo of the
Rainebow Engine and Chapter 3.
It's uhh... uhmmm...

Ok look, Madeline did that thing
again where she bit off more than
she could chew.
THAT DOESN'T MEAN THIS IS BAD!!1!

It just means that the engine is
(mostly( finished, but the game
content is going to take some more
time.

Between the artwork, the music,
and building the enging to be
reusable, time got chipped away
too quickly

It's a bummer, but she can
only cut back on so much sleep
to keep working before she
snaps...

And we all agree, that rarely
ends well.

When you go through this demo
you'll get a pretty good sense of
how things are going to work.

And then afterwards you can go
ahead and check out the code.
AHHH WTF!?

Oh I'm sorry, is it inappropriate
for the "Cut Content" to
butt on in?
Erm...

So yeah let's skip this lame
preamble and get to the f***ing
demo.
Have fun!
So...

I guess enjoy the tech demo for
Chapter 3.

And Mads will send you a link once
the whole game is done.

Thanks again for helping
me learn to do all this
